thread.section_title: Arts and Entertainment coverage for all ages and interests - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: ‘Pound’ provides in-depth view, literally and comically
thread.title_full: ‘Pound’ provides in-depth view, literally and comically - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Robert Hurwitt
title: ‘Pound’ provides in-depth view, literally and comically
text:
Photo: Ian Douglas Marga Gomez slips into a wild array of characters, body parts and so on in “Pound.” Marga Gomez slips into a wild array of characters, body parts and...
Marga Gomez gets down and raunchy in “Pound,” her solo show that received its West Coast premiere Saturday, Oct. 17, in Brava Theater Center’s small upstairs Studio. How raunchy? Let’s just say that certain regions of female reproductive anatomy are pretty explicitly explored. Not to mention metaphorically. And ridiculously.
